meanings.definition: The face or facial expression of a person
meanings.sent1: She could see the different visages of her friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted the visages of the people in the village.
meanings.sent3: The funny hats they wore changed their visages completely.
meanings.sent4: The visages of the actors on stage told a story of their own.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was filled with eerie visages staring back at us.

meanings.definition: A person's appearance or facial features
meanings.sent1: The visages of the twins were so similar that it was hard to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The old photograph captured the visages of our ancestors.
meanings.sent3: The clown's colorful visage made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The visages of the statues in the museum seemed frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The visages of the actors in the play were full of emotion and depth.
